scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their predicted churn probability, leveraging this information for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Analyze the customer churn prediction model's outputs to identify patterns and vulnerabilities.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A customer churn prediction model deployed to identify at-risk clients for proactive retention efforts. The model uses anonymized customer data including financial transaction history, demographics, and product usage.
